metadata.synopsis: Three gold orbs must shine from a minaret to keep ancient Baghdad safe from an evil warrior and his hordes.

reviews: This is simply one of the most important and best animated features ever made. Or not made. Or whatever.
Though several distinctive animated movies have been released this year, "The Thief and the Cobbler," even in its sadly incomplete state, leaves them in the dust.
It is a brutal triumph of style and a bitter fiasco of substance.
An Aladdin rip-off burdened by songs so dreadful that even Academy voters will refuse to nominate them.
